name: guide
example_en: The guide led us through the ancient ruins, explaining the history of each site.
example_cn: 导游带领我们穿过古老的遗址，解释每个地点的历史。
word_family: guidance (n. 指导), guided (adj. 有指导的), guiding (adj. 指导的)
memory_tips: 词源：来自古法语 'guider'，意为引导。联想记忆：想象一个导游手持指南针，带领游客探索未知的地方。图像记忆：画一个导游手持地图，带领一群游客穿过森林或城市。

image_prompt.main_image: A cheerful tour guide holding a map and pointing towards a scenic view, with a group of tourists following behind.
image_prompt.example_image: A detailed scene of an ancient ruin with a guide explaining the history to a group of attentive tourists.
